data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Kunene, Namibia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kunene, Namibia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 10,838 believers living in Kunene, Namibia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kunene, Namibia.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Kunene, Namibia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Kunene
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Kunene, Namibia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kunene, Namibia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Kunene, Namibia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

location.name: Kunene
location.people_groups_list: Gciriku, Naro, Mbukushu, Yeyi, Handa, Tsexa
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gciriku (2,600), Naro (2,100), Mbukushu (37,000), Yeyi (7,100), Handa, Tsexa (1,100)
